content.description:
New sport Crag near Marble canyon. North facing, and treed wall, with Steep and overhung climbing on limestone.  
 -Climb some Multi’s, or hide in the summer heat/sun with some hard sport climbing.  
  
 So far there are 4 new routes, 3 are open projects.  
 The beautiful yellow streaked corner being the first to be redpointed ‘iridescent’ 5.12 b/c, the rest to be around the same levels of difficulty or harder.  
  
 From left to right  
 -‘miles between you’     5.12-/+             20m  10bolts  
 -‘rumour has it’               5.12+/13-        18m  12bolts 
 -‘iridescent’                     5.12b/c            14m  9bolts  
 -‘Turning Tables’            5.13+                12m  6bolts
